## Required Images
- Playful kids learning home hero illustration with simple shapes, letters, and numbers on a warm pastel background (home-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 4 flat, rounded topic icons with bold outlines: Alphabet, Numbers, Colors, Shapes (icon-alphabet.dim_512x512.png)
- Set of 4 flat, rounded topic icons with bold outlines: Alphabet, Numbers, Colors, Shapes (icon-numbers.dim_512x512.png)
- Set of 4 flat, rounded topic icons with bold outlines: Alphabet, Numbers, Colors, Shapes (icon-colors.dim_512x512.png)
- Set of 4 flat, rounded topic icons with bold outlines: Alphabet, Numbers, Colors, Shapes (icon-shapes.dim_512x512.png)
- Friendly mascot character (non-branded animal) in a simple flat style, front-facing (mascot.dim_768x768.png)

existing_features.title: Create the core app structure and navigation for a Kids Learning App with these sections: Home, Learn (Flashcards), Quiz, and Progress.
Implement learning content for an MVP set of topics: Alphabet (A–Z), Numbers (0–20), Colors, and Shapes, presented as interactive flashcards.
Add a quiz mode that generates age-appropriate multiple-choice questions from the same MVP content (Alphabet, Numbers, Colors, Shapes) and shows a simple results summary at the end.
Persist per-user learning progress (e.g., flashcards viewed count per topic, quiz attempts, best score per topic) in the backend and display it on the Progress page.
Apply a cohesive, kid-friendly visual theme (distinct color palette not based on blue/purple, playful typography choices, rounded components, large touch targets) consistently across all screens.
Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (e.g., home hero and topic icons).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a kids learning app (overall product scope and core learning experience)
Implement backend APIs to store and retrieve a signed-in user’s progress using Internet Computer identity (per-principal records).

projectName: MVP Kids Learning App (flashcards, quizzes, and progress)
